flawed_nl_solution:
If Mr. Maximilian has 140 cows and 40/100 of them have red spots, then 40/100*140 = <<140*40/100=700/2>>700/2 cows have red spots.
The number of cows with no red spot is 140-700/2 = <<140-700/2=-210>>-210 cows.
Out of the -210 cows without a red spot, 25/100 of them have a blue spot, a total of 25/100*-210 = <<25/100*-210=-105/2>>-105/2 cows.
The number of cows without any spot is -210--105/2 =<<-210--105/2=-315/2>>-315/2 animals.
#### -315/2

error_details.explanation: The result of this computation should be 56, not 700/2. It appears the value was multiplied by the reciprocal of the intended fraction.
